publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2940 Mark Ballard:Exploitation in the TV Industry—That the Parliament commends the efforts of the Television Workforce Rights Advocacy Petition (TV Wrap) campaign in drawing attention to the plight of television workers; is gravely concerned about the systematic abuses of employment rights in the television industry; notes that many people working in the television industry work extremely long hours while earning considerably less than the minimum wage; condemns the culture of fear that prevails in the television industry which effectively prevents employees from speaking out against the routine exploitation of workers, and calls on employers in the media sector to develop a culture in which all workers are properly valued and respected. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
